imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide training banner photo, modern classroom scene (truevolts-slider-1.dim_1600x600.jpg)
- Wide lab/workshop photo with students coding (truevolts-slider-2.dim_1600x600.jpg)
- Wide mentorship/discussion session photo (truevolts-slider-3.dim_1600x600.jpg)
- Wide technology training lab interior photo (truevolts-slider-4.dim_1600x600.jpg)
- Wide group learning session photo (truevolts-slider-5.dim_1600x600.jpg)

existing_features.title: Update the landing page slider so it uses a dedicated set of slider images that are different from the images used in the Training Environment gallery (no shared filenames/assets between the slider and gallery).
Add the new dedicated slider images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the slider component.

Change the visual style of the Services section (frontend/src/components/landing/ServicesSection.tsx) to a noticeably different, more polished presentation while keeping the existing four services (icons, titles, descriptions) unchanged.

Change the visual style of the Training Environment section (frontend/src/components/landing/GallerySection.tsx) to a noticeably different, more polished gallery presentation while keeping the same 9 gallery images and the section title text unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Use different images for the slide bar (slider) vs the gallery (no longer shared/same images)
Update/change the visual style of the Services section
Update/change the visual style of the Training Environment section

projectName: Use distinct slider vs gallery images and restyle Services + Training Environment sections
